EdgePositions - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Model.PlayGround
EdgePositions Class: Purpose: Managing the Edge Cases the Play Area can be in, when the Player is Placing a Card: Checking if the Player's move needs the PlayArea dimensions to be modified Modify the PlayArea dimensions if needed Contains: EdgeCases ENUM to keep track of all the only possible edge cases SetCornersToCheck method
